content: the app was working perfectly then just stopped a few days ago, i can no longer log in, whenever i try to log in i get an error.
Please improve this app; unlike the previous one, I cannot do transactions.

Great update with some useful new features, but a few are still missing, and the app feels slower than before. I suggest the following improvements: 1. Mask the account balance on the send money page. 2. Enable Lipa na M-Pesa (Buy Goods - Safaricom) functionality. 3. Add a prompt feature to request money from any M-Pesa number, similar to the deposit prompt. 4. The "Fund My Card" option hasn't worked for meâ€”please check if it's a wider issue.
